{
    int index;
    for (index = 0; index < owner->gateSize(name); index++) {
        cGate *gate = type == cGate::NONE ? owner->gate(name, index) : owner->gateHalf(name, type, index);
        if (!gate->isConnectedOutside()) {
            return gate;
        }
